## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description | Type                                                                                            | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------- |
| `active`   | `active`   | 选中样式        | `boolean`                                                                                       | `false` |
| `class`    | `class`    | 组件 class 样式 | `string`                                                                                        | `""`    |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | 禁止选中样式      | `boolean`                                                                                       | `false` |
| `type`     | `type`     | 主题色         | `"danger" \| "dark" \| "info" \| "light" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `null`  |
